post.text: BEAUTIFUL RALLY IN NORTH CAROLINA EARLIER - - NOW IN PENNSYLVANIA, JOIN ME LIVE!

comment.author: Morgan
comment.text: CNN is making me soooo mad. I can't stand to warch it any more.

replies.author: Zulaima
replies.text: Both networks(and other sites too) lie.One lies against Trump and the other lies against Hillary

replies.author: Zulaima
replies.text: Morgan how will you feel when he cuts off your native american benefits and lets the South Dakota pipeline continue? He is totally for fossil fuel and coal mining. He said he backs those projects.
